headline: Valspar Championship releases final field ahead of next weekend’s tournament
sentences: The field is set and by this time next week, clubs will be swinging on Innisbrook’s Copperhead Course as the Valspar Championship kicks off in Palm Harbor.

Here’s the field, in world ranking order, as it currently stands:
** denotes sponsor exemption
No.
The tournament field includes 140 players, with one sponsor exemption still to be determined.
17 Sam Burns is ready to defend his title, battling 20 other of the world’s top 50 players.
Monday’s open qualifier at Southern Hills will determine the final four golfers.
Ticket information can be found at valsparchampionship.com/tickets-packages/.
Golfers will tee off Thursday morning and play will conclude March 20.
Additionally, seven of the tournament’s past champions will compete.

17 Sam Burns, Valspar’s defending champion
No.

27 Paul Casey, who won in 2018 and 2019
No.

101 Kevin Streelman, who won in 2013
No.

91 Gary Woodland, who won in 2011
No.
